DataElement.preferredName: Health Status Assessment Record Information Source Type Code PCORnet CDM Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a clinician that is based on a physical exam, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.:Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events._A coded value specifying the kind of system or data collection from which the record of the activity was derived.:A data model designed to standardize PCORnet data._Watching something and taking note of what happens._Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events._A coded value specifying the kind of system or data collection from which the record of the activity was derived._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a physician or registered nurse, based on clinical and laboratory data, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms.  2. The process by which a patient's condition is appraised or evaluated. (Taber's)
